caption.p: Comparison of the significant Grime strategies between A. altissima (AA forests) and native forests. ( a) Competitive-ruderal p value = 0.008 **; ( b) Competitive-stress tolerant p value = 0.005 **; ( c) Competitive p = 0.1. p level: *** p < 0.001; ** p < 0.01; * p â‰¤ 0.05. Significant values are in bold.
